azurerm_storage_table_entity.description: Manages an Entity within a Table in an Azure Storage Account.

storage_account_name.description: Specifies the storage account in which to create the storage table entity.

table_name.description: The name of the storage table in which to create the storage table entity.

partition_key.description: The key for the partition where the entity will be inserted/merged. Changing this forces a new resource.

row_key.description: The key for the row where the entity will be inserted/merged. Changing this forces a new resource.

entity.description: A map of key/value pairs that describe the entity to be inserted/merged in to the storage table.

id.description: The ID of the Entity within the Table in the Storage Account.

create.description: Used when creating the Storage Table Entity.

update.description: Used when updating the Storage Table Entity.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Storage Table Entity.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Storage Table Entity.
